segments.text: ... so , I said , let ’ s take a break.And since that night , I ’ Ve been waiting for him to call , but I still haven ’ t heard from him . You don ’ t think he ’ s seeing someone else , do you ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Come on , don ’ t be so dramatic ! I ’ m sure everything is going to work out just fine .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: You think so ? Oh , no ! How can he do this to me ? I ’ m sure he ’ s cheating on me ! Why else wouldn ’ t he call ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: But , you two are on a break . Theoretically he can do whatever he likes .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: He ’ s the love of my life ! I ’ Ve really messed this up .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Come on , hon . Pull yourself together . It ’ s going to be alright .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: But I ... I still love him ! And it ’ s all my fault ! I can ’ t believe how immature and selfish I was being . I mean , he is a firefighter , it ’ s not like he can just leave someone in a burning building and meet me for dinner . I ’ Ve totally messed this up !
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: You know what , Veronica , I think you should make the first step . I ’ m sure he ’ ll forgive you ...
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: No , this is not gonna happen ! I ... I ’ Ve ruined everything ...
segments.speaker: S1
